dct_title_s: Mappemonde, ou, Description du globe terrestre [cartographic material] : dres??e fur les memoires les plus nouveaux, et assujettie aux observations astronomiques / par Robert de Vaugondy, fils.
dct_description_sm: Restored from the original by Editio Totius Mundi, Vienna.;Facsimile of the 1752 ed., published by Robert de Vaugondy.;Scale not given. Relief shown by shading. "No. 2102.";2 maps, colored;63 x 85 cm., each 35 cm. in diameter
